title: sarasvati dayai
sahitya:
sarasvati dayai nidhi nI gati taNNaruL tandaruLvAi bhArati


anupallavi

  kara malar miLir maNi mAlaiyum vINaiyum
karuNai pozhiyum kaDaik-kaNNazhagum vaLar


caraNam   ninnaruL oLi illaiyAnAl mana iruL nIngumO sakala kalai mAdE veLLanna vAhani veN kamala malar vaLarum vANi veLLaik kalaiyaNi purANi
